name: Juan's Anticucho Roll
description:
Game made for the Dieciocho Jam, a game jam where chilean devs made Chile-themed games.
It's time for the festivities and that means one thing: cooking your favorite dish, anticuchos! You'll need to push them around to make sure both sides get cooked, and make sure they don't get burnt.

Didn't have time to work on the more interesting mechanics that I had in mind so it's pretty simple, but I hope you enjoy it. You download the source below, but it's a big huge mess of code.
